Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Identified the sequence of strict normative rules and the recommended desiderata from the problem statement.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyzed Case 1 event log to confirm that it strictly adheres to the sequence of normative rules without any violations.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Analyzed Case 2 and identified two normative rule violations: Credit Check performed after Risk Assessment, and Finalize Documentation performed after a rejection.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Noted potential reasoning for the Case 2 normative violations, such as oversight or misunderstanding of the strict sequence.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyzed Case 3 and determined no normative rule violations but identified multiple desiderata violations (Credit Check delayed, Inform Applicant delayed, no Follow-up Call).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Proposed that the delays and missed recommendations in Case 3 might be due to workload or resource constraints.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Cross-referenced the timeline of Case 3 to ensure the activities were in sequence and aligned with the normative rules despite desiderata violations.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Suggested possible reasons for missing Follow-up Calls in Case 3, such as organizational inefficiency or prioritization of other tasks.
